lead_paragraph: A video shows one of the officers slapping and kicking a young man at a school as the other officer stands by.

headline.print_headline: 2 Baltimore School Officers Charged in Beating on Video
headline.main: 2 Baltimore School Officers Arrested in Assault on Teenager

snippet: A video shows one of the officers slapping and kicking a young man at a school as the other officer stands by.
abstract: Baltimore school Police Officers Anthony Spence and Saverna Bias are charged with assault and misconduct in connection with cellphone video that shows them beating teenage student.
